Payments are Eating the World

The document discusses the disruption of traditional payment systems by fintech companies and JPMorgan Chase's position in this market. With an extraordinary number of products and services, huge economies of scale, a fortress balance sheet, and a trusted brand, JPMorgan Chase is well-positioned to navigate the changing payments landscape. The company has already moved $8 trillion (99% digital) a day for 52 million payments and plans to leverage AI and cloud to better serve its customers.

Key Concepts:

  • Digital payments
  • Risk management
  • Artificial intelligence
  • Cloud computing
  • aggregation of services
  • embedded payment capabilities
  • omnichannel business models
  • labor force structure
  • creator economy
